name: Bacteria Blast
description:
There has been an attack from some viruses! Kill as much as you can before they overwhelm the entire immune system!

Made with pygame for My First Game Jam Summer 2022

Use your mouse to play the game.

Currently, the game lacks bacteria and a pause screen (although they may be added soon)

Sound effects made with Bfxr

Graphics made with Microsoft Paint

Press Start font made by codeman38
